overview: The tawdry series continues with more luscious ladies seducing each other in torrid trysts of love triangles. Raven LeChance is nervous when she hears about the escapades of her friends Jodi, Desi and Alexa, but she is tempted to give in to her innermost desires. One evening with Prinzzess awakens the passion inside Raven, and she quickly finds even more satisfaction with the lovely Lily Carter.
title: Lesbian Triangles 27
